title: on me by section 1(5) of the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous 

Provisions) Act 2023 (Commencement) Order 2023.

title: on me by section 1(5) of the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: In this Order, “Act of 2023” means the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2023” means the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous 

Provisions) Act 2023 (No. 24 of 2023).
text_norm: 2 order act 2023 mean criminal justice (miscellaneous provisions) act 2023 (no 24 2023)

title: on me by section 1(5) of the Criminal Justice (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: 3. The 1st day of August 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
3. The 1st day of August 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 

following provisions of the Act of 2023 shall come into operation: 

(a) Part 1 (other than subsections (3) and (4) of section 1); 

(b) Part 3; 

(c) 

sections 61 and 62; 

(d) 

section 71; 

(e) 

(f) 

section 74; 

section 78; 

(g) 

section 86. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 July, 2023. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th August, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [391] 3
